Lake_Charles.McNeese Arena: McNeese Arena, also known as the Ralph O. Ward Gymnasium, is a 5,000 seat multi-purpose arena located in the McNeese State Recreational Sports Complex in Lake Charles, Louisiana. It is named after Ralph O. Ward, who was head coach of the men's basketball team from 1952 to 1971. It is currently home of the men's and women's indoor track and field teams.
